response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value and is worth $800,000 to you. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a price of $750,000 for the product. This offer allows you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate, while also enabling me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful business relationship.", "product_price": 750000}
